posts.post_content:
I'm now down to needing 50 T206s for a complete set of fronts, after years of off-and-on collecting on a budget. In addition to the top rarities (Wagner, Plank, Doyle, Demmitt, O'Hara, as well as Elberfield Washington), I also lack most of the top-tier HOFers, which are rarely available in my price range, and 9 of the 48 Southern Leaguers. But there are also plenty of commons I still don't have. 

Below is the list of everything I need, with SLers and HOFers noted. If anybody has any of these available for a reasonable price, preferably but not necessarily raw, let me know. (I currently have 32 graded T206s out of 500+ total cards.) Eye appeal is big for me, and while I like a good, clean, crease-free card as much as the next guy, I don't mind technical flaws that don't detract much from the eye appeal, such as pinholes or unobtrusive paper loss on the back. That's especially true if it's an otherwise tough/expensive card. I don't have a ton of extra $$$ to spend right now, especially after some big recent purchases, but I thought I would throw this list up there while I'm thinking of it.

My PM box is close to full, so I'd prefer e-mail at [url]dkathman@uchicago.edu[/url].

Heinie Berger
Bill Bernhard (SL)
Bill Bradley (portrait)
Bill Bradley (batting)
John Butler
Ty Cobb (green portrait) (HOF)
Ty Cobb (red portrait) (HOF)
Ty Cobb (bat off) (HOF)
Ty Cobb (bat on) (HOF)
Dode Criss
Ray Demmitt (St. Louis)
Mike Donlin (seated)
Bill Donovan (portrait)
Mickey Doolin
Joe Doyle (NY Nat'l)
Larry Doyle (with bat)
Bull Durham
Kid Elberfield (Washington)
Ed Foster (SL)
Ed Greminger (SL)
Buck Hooker (SL)
Miller Huggins (portrait) (HOF)
Walter Johnson (pitching) (HOF)
Walter Johnson (portrait) (HOF)
Willie Keeler (portrait) (HOF)
Napoleon Lajoie (portrait) (HOF)
Napoleon Lajoie (throwing) (HOF)
Napoleon Lajoie (batting) (HOF)
Tommy Leach (with cap)
Perry Lipe (SL)
Sherwood Magie
Sherwood Magee (portrait)
John McGraw (glove at hip) (HOF)
John McGraw (portrait with cap) (HOF)
Fred Merkle (portrait)
Herbie Moran (Providence)
Dom Mullaney (SL)
Danny Murphy (with bat)
Bill O'Hara (St. Louis)
Bill Otey (SL)
Frank Owen
Eddie Plank (HOF)
Ambrose Puttman
Ray Ryan (SL)
Admiral Schlei (portrait)
Shag Shaughnessy (SL)
Tris Speaker (HOF)
Honus Wagner (HOF)
Cy Young (bare hand) (HOF)
Cy Young (portrait) (HOF)
Down to 50 needed, thanks to Frank, Mike, and Scott. Anybody else have any of these available?
